title: wine_Abiqua_Wind_NV_Bin_5_Abiqua_Cuvée_White_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 69271.
country: US.
description: A mix of Pinot Gris, Müller-Thurgau, Riesling and more, this all-purpose white wine shows a steady hand at the blending table. Nothing dominates, but it seems as if the best of each component is showcased. Ripe forward pineapple and white peach fruit, lively spice and a sappy acid-driven finish all come into focus. If the standard varietal white wine options are feeling a bit boring, this may help to reinvigorate your palate..
designation: Bin 5 Abiqua Cuvée.
points: 88.
price: 15.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
